name: hipaa-compliance
description: HIPAA Privacy Rule compliance with PHI handling, access controls, and audit logging
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: HIPAA Privacy Suite
card.description: PHI handling, access controls, and audit logging

summary.overview: HIPAA Privacy Rule compliance with PHI detection and masking, minimum necessary enforcement, access control validation, audit trail logging, and breach notification support.
summary.exampleUseCase: Automatically detect PHI in documents, enforce role-based access controls, log all PHI access for audit, and generate breach notification reports when required.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Local-first means PHI never leaves your infrastructure for compliance checking. Pairs with medical module and FHIR compliance for complete healthcare data governance.
